data.englishTranslation: O Allah, we ask You to restrain them by their necks and we seek refuge in You from their evil.
data.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innaa naj'aluka fee nuhoorihim wa na'oothu bika min shuroorihim.
data.arabicVerse: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَجْعَلُكَ فِي نُحُورِهِمْ وَنَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شُرُورِهِمْ

data.englishTranslation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
data.transliteration: Allaahumma 'Anta 'adhudee, wa 'Anta naseeree, bika 'ajoolu, wa bika 'asoolu, wa bika 'uqaatilu.
data.arabicVerse: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ عَضُدي، وَأَنْتَ نَصِيرِي، بِكَ أَحُولُ وَبِكَ أَصُولُ وَبِكَ أُقَاتِلُ

data.englishTranslation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
